ClearLimitUtilByObj
clearLimitUtilByObj.
Clear limit utilization by object
Purpose:
Deleting (clearing) data on the utilization of the limit by a specific object of the System.
Syntax:
Parameters:
ObjId â€“ a System object identifier (for example: Application for decision, Transaction, Issue structure, etc.)
Attention: The function deletes utilization/recovery entries in all limit/sublimit profiles (including versioned sublimits) utilized by the object specified.
